course_description: This course surveys the complex and evolving relationship between corporations and society. This course adopts a broad theoretical perspective on the challenges and opportunities that corporations confront in their interactions with society, such as struggles to maintain legitimacy, acquire resources, build partnerships, and solve complex global problems.
sections: Class Nbr: 6682, Section #: 1109, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Lowy, Status: Open
